comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: That's Mrs. John Sherwin Crosby (the former Nellie Fassett), founder and president of the Women's Democratic Club of New York City, president of the Woman's National Democratic League--she gave a victory breakfast at the Waldorf-Astoria to congratulate the incoming first lady, Mrs. Wilson, and her daughters. uic.edu/orgs/cwluherstory/jofreeman/polhistory/1912.htm

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks! We'll add her full name (and date from neg.) to the source data and reload the description
